results.title: Effects of Metformin Therapy on Coronary Endothelial Dysfunction in Patients With Prediabetes With Stable Angina and Nonobstructive Coronary Artery Stenosis: The CODYCE Multicenter Prospective Study.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To evaluate the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy on coronary endothelial function and major @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@adverse cardiac@@@ events (MACE) in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@ with @DISEASE_Angina_Stable @DISEASE_MESH:D060050 @@@stable angina@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_MINOCA</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000088442 @@@nonobstructive coronary stenosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_MINOCA</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000088442 @@@NOCS@@@).
